name: Advanced Lawnmower Simulator (Ben James)
description:
First, a little history lesson

TLDR; joke game first made for April Fool's Day, 1988 on the ZX Spectrum. Many remakes have been made; this is another one.

  • Outstanding graphics
  • Updated smooth gameplay
  • Multiple endings
  • Audible sound
  • Knowledge of ancient British humour an advantage

Controls: use the arrow keys and space bar to select a mower

"Absolutely amazing game!" - Richard Darling
